Package grab.szan.commands

package grab.szan.commands
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    grab.szan
     
    grab.szan.boardBuilders
     
    grab.szan.controller
     
    grab.szan.main
     
    grab.szan.utils
     
  • Class
    Description
    AcceptJoinCommand
    Command that is executed when the server accepts a player's join request.
    ChangePlayerColorCommand
    Command responsible for changing the color of a player's nickname in the GameViewController.playerListView so that the nickname color matches the color of the player's pieces on the board.
    Command
     
    CommandHandler
    A class responsible for mapping string commands to their corresponding Command implementations.
    DisplayCommand
    A command that displays a message (via an alert) on the client side.
    SetFieldCommand
    A command that updates the state of a specific field on the board (e.g., setting player pieces).
    SetIdCommand
    Command responsible for setting the client's ID, usually triggered by the server when the game starts or a player's ID is reassigned.
    UpdatePlayerListCommand
    Command that updates the client's player list in the GameViewController.
    UpdateTurnCommand
    Command that updates the UI to indicate whose turn it is.
